tool_description: The Harmony API offers access to a diverse collection of musical compositions. You can retrieve details about random compositions or search for specific ones by composer, instrumentation, style, key, or title.
name: Harmony
title: Harmony

api_list.name: Random
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a random musical composition from the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harmony6.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harmony6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Style
api_list.description: Retrieve compositions based on a specific musical style.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harmony6.p.rapidapi.com/style/Romantic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harmony6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://harmony6.p.rapidapi.com/style/{style}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harmony6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Perform a flexible search for compositions using multiple criteria, such as composer, instrumentation, style, key, and title.

api_list.name: Title
api_list.description: Retrieve compositions based on a specific work title.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harmony6.p.rapidapi.com/title/Eleven New Bagatelles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harmony6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
